word:
Brother Prescott, your ministerial ability is needed in the work that God requires shall be done in the cities. These cities are not to be left unenlightened and unwarned. Open your eyes to see the work that is to be done in sowing the seeds of truth in new places.--Ms 41, 1909, pp. 1, 2. ("A Message to Responsible Men and Church Members." Typed June 3, 1909.) 


                                   -223-
